Is there a person who dies and is reborn again?

For those who have affection, love, and desire, they will be reborn as humans in the next life.

Can a person who with a good mind thinks of the right Dharma and is wise, are the meanings of these two things the same?

Has the king ever seen a wheat harvester?

The king said:
Excellent, excellent!
The king asked NÄsa again:
What are the other good things?

Excellent! Excellent!

Nagasena said in the sutra:

The king asked Nagasena again:

Among all wholesome [actions], having a single mind is the foremost.

It is like a building that must rely on something. All wholesome paths are attached to a single mind.
